sourcesContent:
import { React , useState } from 'react' import './post.css' import { MoreVert,ThumbUpAlt } from "@material-ui/icons"; import { Users } from '../../dummy_data' export default function Post({post}) { const user = Users.filter((u) => (u.id == post.userId)) const [like,setLike] = useState(post.like) return (
{user[0].username} {post.date}
{post.desc}
{like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
) }
